description: Balance Wellspace Integrative Medicine | 81 followers on LinkedIn. Our expert team of providers uses a whole-body approach to detect, correct, and restore your body to its optimal health. | Balance Wellspace is an integrated medical center committed to changing healthcare in our community. We offer physical medicine, chiropractic, physical rehabilitation, IV nutrition, and medical weight loss to help our patients achieve optimal wellness.
